alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 9:52AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow, areas of blowing snow, wind chill values as low as -35 degrees. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Treasure, Custer, Fallon, and Northern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
